name: DEWALT
tools: React, TailwindCSS, DaisyUI, React-Router-Dom, Firebase Authentication, Private Route, Node, Express, JWT, MongoDB
description: This is a full-stack Product Manufacturer Website. Users need to log in with Google with Firebase Authentication. Dashboard with nested route for User and Admin. Admin can manage orders, quantity, add or delete. Items and reviews can be added to this website. Items can be ordered by payment method.

name: Smart Electronics
tools: React, React Bootstrap, React-Router-Dom, Firebase Authentication, Private Route, Node, Express, JWT, MongoDB
description: This is a full-stack Warehouse Management Website that multiple users can use. Users are also allowed to login and sign up. Users can access it through social network(Google). Users can add or delete items from inventory. Users can update the quantity of products and sell information. A authorized user can restock the quantity of products and manage his products

name: MS Photography

description: This is independent service provider website. Any independent service provider can use this. It helps him to service people in online.

name: MS Furniture

description: This is a Products analysis website. In this website i used rechart which helps to analise sell and profit of a shop. There were some customer review in this site.
